title: #1487 A Glitch In The System
itunes:title: #1487 A Glitch In The System
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing the idea of viral headlines and the overwhelming frequency of them being blatantly incorrect or at best misleading. Drew also brings up Dave Chappelle's new special 'The Closer' and the controversy surrounding the subject matter. The guys then turn to the phones and speak to a caller with a question about their hygiene habits and how they decide what practices to engage in. 

Please Support Our Sponsors:

Subscribe to The Jordan Harbinger Show
Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
